The risks
Amniocentesis	has	a	0.5–1%	
risk of miscarriage. At most, 
one test in 100 will result 
in pregnancy loss. When 
deciding whether or not 
to go ahead with this test, 
try to balance the risk of 
miscarriage against the value 
of the result to you.
